function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Bmi measurement using nurse-measured height and weight may lead to inaccurate results.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anxiety and depressive symptoms measured using hads-a and hads-d scales may not capture the full extent of mental health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Self-reported history of diabetes and cvd may result in underreporting or overreporting of the conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining response categories may lead to loss of granularity in data and potential misrepresentation of health status.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recoding variables may introduce bias and distort the true impact of covid-19 on individual health and well-being.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Online survey questionnaires completed during lockdown may introduce selection bias.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of participants with no garden access may introduce selection bias and limit generalizability of results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of younger age groups in the sample may skew the results and limit generalizability to a broader age range.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact among gardeners may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High frequency of garden usage may increase the risk of exposure to airborne diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between emotional\\/mental health and covid-19 anxiety may indicate a higher risk of psychological distress and mental health challenges within the garden community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased garden usage associated with better health outcomes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No significant difference in health outcomes between gardening and non-gardening groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between garden usage and anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of association between garden measures and perceived change in self-reported health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Older adults spending more time in the garden during covid-19 lockdown reported better health and wellbeing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on the impact of \\\\u2019nature\\\\u2019 of garden activity gardening or relaxing on wellbeing during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to private outdoor space for older adults","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in access to green space and nature","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity among older adults","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunities for older adults to exercise have been greatly impacted due to covid-19 lockdown measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to nature can benefit psychological health, wellbeing, and quality of life.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of contagious disease transmission through interaction with neighbors in communal green spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of vitamin d deficiency among older scottish adults due to decreased sunlight exposure.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks associated with the potential spread of contagious diseases in domestic gardens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory findings about the association between gardening and health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for gardening frequency and duration in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited characterization of variance in gardening activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to establish cause and effect relationships due to cross-sectional design","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of responses across categories including garden usage frequency","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unaccounted for factors affecting health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for further lockdown re-instatement at a local or national level","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended adverse consequences on health and wellbeing due to global efforts to reduce the transmission of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of insight into lifestyle measures to mitigate impacts of covid-19 on health and wellbeing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No significant association found between gardening and physical health change scores.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No significant association found between garden usage and change in emotional and mental health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No significant association found between gardening and perceived change in sleep quality since lockdown started.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of sars cov-2 coronavirus pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large number of confirmed covid-19 cases in europe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"State of emergency and implementation of preventive or containment quarantine in spain","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households due to prolonged confinement and increased interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of previous technical studies on confined households and dwellings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on the impact of domestic spaces on socio-economic and psychological conditions during confinement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of alteration of daily activities and habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation of the impact degree of confinement on public health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of the incidence of home-dwelling relationship in different habitats and urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confinement at home due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using online forms and surveys may limit the reach to potential participants who do not have internet access.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sending emails to neighborhood associations and town councils may raise privacy concerns and increase the risk of data breaches.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The non-probabilistic sample for convenience may introduce bias in the study results and limit the generalizability of findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
